AcceptedOn__c.description: Date on which the claim was accepted.

AdjudicatedAmount__c.description: Amount paid for the service by primary payer.

AdjudicatedOn__c.description: Date on which adjudication amount was paid by the primary payer.

BilledDRGCode__c.description: Diagnosis-related group (DRG) code used for billing.

ClaimAmount__c.description: Amount submitted with the original claim.

DrugSupplyDays__c.description: Number of days the supply is authorized for.

FillDate__c.description: Date on which the drug was filled by the pharmacy.

FormularyTier__c.description: The formulary tier level for the drug.

HIC3ClassCode__c.description: Hierarchical Specific Therapeutic (HIC3) class code assigned to the service.

IsFormularyStatus__c.description: Indicates whether the drug is approved for coverage.

IsGeneric__c.description: Indicates whether the drug is generic.

IsRefillAuthorized__c.description: Indicates whether refills for the drug are authorized.

MemberPlanId__c.description: ID of member plan that this claim is related to.

PartBorPartD__c.description: Indicates whether the drug has Medicare Part B or Part D coverage.

PayerId__c.description: ID of the payer that this claim is related to.

PaymentDate__c.description: Date on which claim was paid out.

ReferralNumber__c.description: ID of the referral for the service.

SourceSystem__c.description: Name of the system where this claim originated.

SourceSystemIdentifier__c.description: ID of the system where this claim was sourced from.

SourceSystemModified__c.description: Timestamp of the most recent update from the source system.

StandardGenericTherapeuticClass__c.description: Therapeutic drug category according to the American Hospital Formulary Service (AHFS) classification system.

StandardTherapeuticClassDescription__c.description: Description of the therapeutic category of drug according to the American Hospital Formulary Service (AHFS) classification system.
